ComicInfo.Summary:
ODD JOB continues, by superstars GREG PAK (Planet Hulk, Firefly) and STEPHEN MOONEY (Grayson, The Dead Hand)!
007: Arrested! John Lee: Saving the world, solo! But when the time comes, will Lee be able to pull the trigger, or will his love for the mind-controlled Agent K prevent him from stopping her terrorist organization from succeeding in their world-altering endgame?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dave Johnson | 1 | B | Cover B | Rags Morales | 2 | C | Cover C | Adam Gorham | 3 | D | Cover D | Stephen Mooney & Triona Farrell | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Dave Johnson | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Adam Gorham | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Rags Morales | 7 | H/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stephen Mooney & Triona Farrell | 8 |
